health.description: Set the health of an entity.

movement.description: Set the movement speed of an entity.

identifier.description: Set the identifier (id) of an entity.

physics.description: Modify the physics of an entity.

fall_damage.description: Modify the fall damage of an entity.

follow_range.description: Define a follow range for the follow_owner component.

horse.jump_strength.description: Define the jump strength of a horse.

knockback_resistance.description: Modify the knockback resistance of an entity.

underwater_movement.description: Modify the underwater movement of an entity.
